players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "I find it strange that Bob was the one who was killed last night. Let's keep a close eye on Alice and make sure she's not hiding anything from us."
Charlie: "I think it's important that we all remain vigilant and work together to figure out who killed Bob last night. Let's keep an open mind and not jump to conclusions based on suspicion alone."
Diana: "Let's focus on Alice, she's the only one who hasn't said anything yet. We don't know if she's a villager or the mafioso."
